page.title: 17LAMERTON CHURCH
page.content: The Church is called{Saint Peter's} church.The vicar is Mr Raymond Chudley.He has been a vicar for 13 years and has only been at Lamerton for two and a half years.He also goes to other parishes including Milton Abbot,Sydenham Damerel and Dunterton.The church was originaly built in the 10th century ,but then it was destroyed by a fire which started near the organ.It was rebuilt and re-opened in 1876.There is a choir at the church.The choir master is Mr Dando {MBE}.The organist is Mr Peter Bazeley.There isnt a Sunday School but some people go to Milton Abbot.There are{8}bells in the bell tower.Peter Bazeley,Mr and Mrs Hill, and Mr and Mrs Osborne are some of the people who ring the bells.The font has a carved wooden lid.The stained glass windows have stories of the Bible on them.
